what is the measure of our lives but
today let me talk to you about three G's
generosity Grace and
gratitude when I look back at my
grandfather it's clear to me that he was
grateful for all that he had and that
enabled him to live a life that put
generosity as his most important
value based on what I know directly of
andata and from hearing an a hotel
employee talk about him it's clear to me
that the Gratitude he feels for all that
he has in his life is what enables him
to live a life of
Grace and it's clear to me that in my
own life maintaining a daily focus on
gratitude has helped me live a richer
and happier life and to behave more
generously and with more
grace we will now present the diplomas
for the master in Business
Administration
degrees there are many metrics one can
use to measure achievement today as we
celebrate your recent achievements and
look ahead to whats to
come I'd urge you to keep in mind the
3Gs yard sticks that are worth pulling
out from time to time if not more

often Jeremy
Martin We are rooting for you to become
leaders who will make a difference in
the world and in the lives of all you
touch the world desperately needs good
leadership and you can provide
it as Nate would remind us make no small
plans as you begin this exciting journey
I wish you God's
